title: muddhumOmu Elaagu
sahitya:
muddumOmu ElAgu celangeno munulETla gani mOhincirO



anupallavi



 kaddanucunu cirakAlamu hrdayamu karagi karagi nilcuvAri kEDutTa rAmuni



caraNam



 manasu nirmalamagu bhUsura krtamO manci pUja phalamO tOlutaTi tapamO 

ghananibha dEhuni janana svabhAvamO dhanapati sakhuDaina tyAgarAjArcituni
